mapper.select: select r.code_rule_index as code_rule_index, r.code_rule_len as code_rule_len, t.code_total_len as code_total_len, r.code_rule_data as code_rule_data, r.code_rule_desc as code_rule_desc, t.code_simple_name as code_simple_name, t.code_full_name as code_full_name, t.code_desc as code_desc from tb_code_rule as r, tb_code_type as t where r.code_rule_type = (select t.code_type_id from tb_code_type as t where t.code_simple_name = #{codeType}) and t.code_type_id = r.code_rule_type;
